sentences.sContent: Dorothea let out a histrionic groan.
sentences.sCn: 多罗西亚发出了一声做作的呻吟。

remMethod.val: histrion(演员) + ic → 戏剧的； 注意不要和historic(adj. 历史的)相混

trans.tranOther: If you refer to someone's behaviour as histrionic, you are critical of it because it is very dramatic, exaggerated, and insincere
